name: Super Hexahedron
description:
Prepare for mind melting twitch action gameplay. Navigate the maze without crashing! 

Art and code by Rolo: http://twitter.com/rolopogo

Music by JellyBear (http://twitter.com/heyjellybear) (https://jellybear.bandcamp.com/)

Created in 48 hours for the Mix and Game Jam 2019

Controls: WASD, Up/down/left/right, or controller

R to restart Escape to quit
